topic.title: EMERGENCY CARE INJURY ACTIVITY STATUS (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: EMERGENCY CARE INJURY ACTIVITY STATUS (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify the status of activity being undertaken by the PATIENT when the injury occurred.
